org.opends.server.replication.server

Class ServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
      • org.opends.server.replication.server.MessageHandler
        • org.opends.server.replication.server.ServerHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataServerHandler, ECLServerHandler, ReplicationServerHandler

    public abstract class ServerHandler
extends MessageHandler
    This class defines a server handler : - that is a MessageHandler (see this class for more details) - that handles all interaction with a peer server (RS or DS).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerHandler

        public ServerHandler(Session session,
             int queueSize,
             java.lang.String replicationServerURL,
             int replicationServerId,
             ReplicationServer replicationServer,
             int rcvWindowSize)
        Creates a new server handler instance with the provided socket.
        Parameters:
        session - The Session used by the ServerHandler to communicate with the remote entity.
        queueSize - The maximum number of update that will be kept in memory by this ServerHandler.
        replicationServerURL - The URL of the hosting replication server.
        replicationServerId - The serverId of the hosting replication server.
        replicationServer - The hosting replication server.
        rcvWindowSize - The window size to receive from the remote server.
